The system of documentation HelpManual focus on professional technical writers and is easy to work with different instruments.

HelpMaual can export documents in various formats, but not in the Wiki-markup.

WikiHelpManual is designed to meet the challenge of export projects HelpManual in MediaWiki-based wiki.

Features:
  * Input data is an xml-export project HM
  * Upload directly to the wiki using MediaWiki API
  * You can authorize in wiki
  * Correct work with images
  * Unloading markup - tables, lists, sections, etc.
  * The processing of registration of the character - bold, italics, etc.
  * Ability to work under Windows and Linux (using mono)
